verses.verse: "Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5265>set<s%> out for the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, and <S%H5437>circled<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
'You have <S%H5437>circled<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H7227>enough.<s%> [Now] <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%>

and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> and they will be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of you. So be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8104>careful;<s%>

do not <S%H1624>provoke<s%> them, for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H4480>any<s%> of their <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> [as little as] a <S%H4096>footstep<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>

"You shall <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> from them with <S%H3701>money<s%> so that you may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and you shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3739>purchase<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from them with <S%H3701>money<s%> so that you may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have <S%H3027>done;<s%> He has <S%H3045>known<s%> your <S%H1980>wanderings<s%> through <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> <S%H2088>These<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has been with you; you have not <S%H2637>lacked<s%> a <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"'

"So we <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>beyond<s%> <S%H4480><s%> our <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H4480>away<s%> from the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H1870>road,<s%> <S%H4480>away<s%> from <S%H9014>Elath<s%> and from Ezion-geber. And we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'Do not <S%H9475>harass<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H1624>provoke<s%> them to <S%H4421>war,<s%> for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H4480>any<s%> of their <S%H776>land<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>
(The <S%H368>Emim<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> there <S%H6440>formerly,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H7227>numerous,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakim.<s%>
Like the <S%H6062>Anakim,<s%> they are <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%> but the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H368>Emim.<s%>

The <S%H2752>Horites<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> but the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> them and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> them and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in their <S%H8478>place,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H3425>possession<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them.)

<S%H6258>'Now<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%> yourselves.' So we <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered.<s%>

"Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> that it <S%H1980>took<s%> for us to <S%H1980>come<s%> from Kadesh-barnea, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered,<s%> was thirty-eight <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the generation of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H8552>perished<s%> from <S%H7130>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them.

<S%H1571>"Moreover<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was against them, to <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them from <S%H7130>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they all <S%H8552>perished.<s%>

"So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> had <S%H8552>finally<s%> <S%H8552>perished<s%> <S%H4191><s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>
that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
'You shall <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

'And when you <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> do not <S%H9475>harass<s%> them <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H1624>provoke<s%> them, for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> as a <S%H3425>possession.<s%>'

(It is <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H2803>regarded<s%> as the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%> [for] <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in it, but the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H2157>Zamzummin,<s%>

a <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H7227>numerous,<s%> and <S%H7311>tall<s%> as the <S%H6062>Anakim,<s%> but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> them. And they <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> them and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in their <S%H8478>place,<s%>

<S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H6213>did<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> He <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in their <S%H8478>place<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H5761>Avvim,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H9161>villages<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> the <S%H3732>Caphtorim<s%> who <S%H3318>came<s%> from <S%H3731>Caphtor,<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H8478>place.<s%>)

<S%H6965>'Arise,<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out, and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon.<s%> <S%H7200>Look!<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> and <S%H1624>contend<s%> with him in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> and <S%H3374>fear<s%> of you upon the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3605>everywhere<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> <S%H834>who,<s%> when they <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> of you, shall <S%H7264>tremble<s%> and be in <S%H9123>anguish<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you.'

"So I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

'Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land,<s%> I will <S%H1980>travel<s%> only on the <S%H1870>highway;<s%> I will not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

'You will <S%H7666>sell<s%> me <S%H400>food<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%> so that I may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%> so that I may <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> on <S%H7272>foot,<s%>

<S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%> and the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H6144>Ar<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for me, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> to us.'

"But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was not <S%H14>willing<s%> for us to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his land; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7185>hardened<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and <S%H553>made<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H553>obstinate,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as [he is] <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7200>'See,<s%> I have <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>over<s%> to you. <S%H2490>Begin<s%> to <S%H3423>occupy,<s%> that you may <S%H3423>possess<s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>'
"Then <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> us in <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H3096>Jahaz.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him <S%H6440>over<s%> to us; and we <S%H5221>defeated<s%> him with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"So we <S%H3920>captured<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H4962>men,<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H2945>children<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%> We <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor.<s%>
"We <S%H962>took<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> as our <S%H962>booty<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we had <S%H3920>captured.<s%>

"From <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%> and [from] the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> even to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> that was <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H7682>high<s%> for us; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>over<s%> to us.

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> you did not <S%H7126>go<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>along<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> and <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.
